HookHorror_AD_HermitHelp.synopsis: when the hook horrors call for help in combat, he'll then run towards the horror and join combat

HookHorror_AD_HermitIdle.synopsis: AD for his idle behaviour when not fighting. This madman lives in the underdark now and is delusional.

HookHorror_AD_HermitReaction.synopsis: plays when you kill the hook horrors. There are two nodes: one for the first horror killed and another for when the last one dies.
